channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游댮 19:35 Air alert in Odesa region. Follow further messages.
item.description: 游댮 19:35 Air alert in Odesa region. Follow further messages. #Odessa_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游릭 17:34 Repel the threat of artillery shelling in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community. Follow further reports.
item.description: 游릭 17:34 Repel the threat of artillery shelling in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community. Follow further reports. #city_of_Nikopol_and_the_Nikopol_territorial_community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 17:09 Alarm lifted in Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in:- Marhanets city and Marhanets territorial community- Nikopol city and Nikopol territorial community- Chervonohryhoriv territorial community
item.description: 游리 17:09 Alarm lifted in Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in:- Marhanets city and Marhanets territorial community- Nikopol city and Nikopol territorial community- Chervonohryhoriv territorial community#Dnipropetrovsk_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游댮 16:18 Threat of artillery shelling! Now in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community there is artillery shelling. Go to shelter!
item.description: 游댮 16:18 Threat of artillery shelling! Now in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community there is artillery shelling. Go to shelter! #city_of_Nikopol_and_the_Nikopol_territorial_community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 16:00 The threat of artillery shelling in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community has been eliminated. Please note, the alert is still ongoing in:- Dnipropetrovsk region
item.description: 游리 16:00 The threat of artillery shelling in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community has been eliminated. Please note, the alert is still ongoing in:- Dnipropetrovsk region #city_of_Nikopol_and_the_Nikopol_territorial_community This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
